pkgmetadata.longdescription: PySight is an application aimed at generating multidimensional imagesfrom photon lists. The main use case is to parse ``.lst`` files whichwere generated by FAST ComTec's multiscaler, but other photon listscan also be parsed.PySight was featured in`this <https://www.osapublishing.org/optica/abstract.cfm?uri=optica-5-9-1104>`_ *Optica* article, and was created in Pablo Blinder's Lab at Tel Aviv University.
